results.short_desc: press system 1 1/2 in. press brass ball valve lead free pc-fp600a-lf 1-1/2 pxp bl vlv
results.long_desc: the nibco press system ball valve body is manufactured from lead free brass alloy and is dezincification resistant. the ball valve is designed with press to connect end connections with an inboard bead and epdm o ring for quick and easy copper to copper joinery. properly applying pressure from a press fit tool tightens the o ring onto the tube ensuring a clean permanent watertight seal in seconds with no flame solder or flux. the nibco press system is user friendly quick and easy to install. when properly crimped a unique n witness mark is clearly visible.

results.short_desc: mechanical t 2 1/2 in. grooved galvanized ductile iron coupling with 1 1/2 in. female bolted branch outlet and e grade epdm gasket style 920n 920n 2-1/2x1-1/2 galv mech tee
results.long_desc: victaulic mechanical t outlet provides a direct branch connection at any location a hole can be cut in pipe. the hole is cut oversize to receive a hole finder locating collar which secures the outlet in position permanently. a pressure responsive gasket seals on the pipe outside diameter. cross type connections can be achieved by utilizing two upper housings of the same style and size with the same or differing branch size connections. style 920n mechanical t outlets are available with grooved or fnpt outlet. units are supplied painted with plated bolts. galvanized housings are available supplied with plated bolts.
results.product_attribute: {'Selling Size': '2-1/2 x 1-1/2 in', 'For Use With': 'Schedule 10 and 40 Carbon Steel Pipe, High Density Polyethylene or Polybutylene (HDPE) Pipes', 'Maximum Pressure Rating': '500 PSI', 'Length': '6.26 in', 'Finish': 'Hot Dipped Galvanized', 'Specifications Met': 'ASTM A536, Grade 65-45-12, UL, ULC Listed, FM Approved', 'Material': 'Ductile Iron', 'Connection Size': '2-1/2 in', 'Minimum Temperature Rating': '-30 deg F', 'Maximum Temperature Rating': '+230 deg F', 'Includes': 'Bolts, Nuts, and EPDM Gasket'}

results.short_desc: 1 1/4 in. grooved galvanized ductile iron rigid coupling style 005 1-1/4 galv vic 005 cplg
results.long_desc: firelock style 005 rigid coupling has a unique patented angle pad design which allows the housings to offset while clamping the grooves. by permitting the housings to slide on the angled bolt pads rigidity is obtained. support and hanging requirements correspond to nfpa 13 sprinkler systems. angle pad design permits assembly by removing one nut/bolt and swinging the housing over the gasket. this reduces components to handle during assembly. the vic plus system patented is dry clean and non toxic. it reduces assembly time substantially and eliminates the mess and chance of over lubrication.
results.product_attribute: {'Selling Size': '1-1/4 in'}
